item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "If you're a nobody, if your work has no impact, then it deserves to be praised. If, however, you climb out of that state of mediocrity and are a success, then your defying 'the law' and deserve to be punished." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rose add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rose add a quote by Andrew Wolfe
item.description: "A book without words is like love without a kiss; it's empty." -- Andrew Wolfe

item.title: Rose add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Rose add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Rose add a quote by bob ong
item.description: "Gamitin ang puso para alagaan ang taong malapit sayo. Gamitin ang utak para alagaan ang sarili mo." -- bob ong

item.title: Rose add a quote by Bob Ong
item.description: "Hikayatin mo lahat ng kakilala mo na magkaroon ng kahit isa man lang paboritong libro sa buhay nila. Dahil wala nang mas kawawa pa sa mga taong literado pero hindi nagbabasa." -- Bob Ong

item.title: Rose add a quote by Bob Ong
item.description: "Ang maganda sa pag-asa, hindi ‘to nakukuha sa’yo nang hindi mo gusto." -- Bob Ong

item.title: Rose add a quote by Bob Ong
item.description: "Imbis na magtanong ka ng ‘Hindi pa ba sapat?’, bakit hindi mo na lang kalimutan ang lahat? Kung alam mong binabalewala ka na, tanggapin mong nagsasawa na s’ya." -- Bob Ong

item.title: Rose add a quote by Bob Ong
item.description: "...madaming teacher sa labas ng eskwelahan. desisyon mo kung kanino ka magpapaturo." -- Bob Ong

item.title: Rose add a quote by Bob Ong
item.description: "Parang "Time's Up!" ang reunion,"pass your papers finished or not!" Oras na para husgahan kung naging sino ka...o kung naging magkano ka. Sino ang naging successful? Sino ang naging pinaka-successful?" -- Bob Ong

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The secret of life, though, is to fall seven times and to get up eight times." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything tells me that I am about to make a wrong decision, but making mistakes is just part of life. What does the world want of me? Does it want me to take no risks, to go back to where I came from because I didn't have the courage to say "yes" to life?" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When someone leaves, it's because someone else is about to arrive." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The simple things are also the most extraordinary things, and only the wise can see them." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When I had nothing to lose, I had everything. When I stopped being who I am, I found myself." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Life is too short, or too long, for me to allow myself the luxury of living it so badly." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Thomas Fuller
item.description: "It is said that the darkest hour of the night comes just before the dawn." -- Thomas Fuller

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "What is a teacher? I'll tell you: it isn't someone who teaches something, but someone who inspires the student to give of her best in order to discover what she already knows." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Anyone who has lost something they thought was theirs forever finally comes to realise that nothing really belongs to them." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Stay mad, but behave like normal people. Run the risk of being different, but learn to do so without attracting attention." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "How much I missed, simply because I was afraid of missing it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "We pretend to be strong because we are weak." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "behind the mask of ice that people wear, there beats a heart of fire." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Rose add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything that happens once can never happen again. But everything that happens twice will surely happen a third time." -- Paulo Coelho
